document_data.name: House of the Dragomen
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Dragomen''' was an official building located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The structure was located in the northcentral section of the city just southwest of the [[Raumkreml]] which was the seat of government in Almorel during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The House of the Dragomen served as a residence of important foreign officials within Almorel. Caravan-masters, provided they were respected enough, were also allowed to stay within the House.
document_data.Inhabitants: The building was run by a [[half-elven]] chamberlain named [[Sirule Kalishenko]].
